body_html:
@kbrems No problem. Please bear in mind that much of this functionality is still being developed/refactored and will probably need to change a little before we are happy with it.

@mrry has just submitted some support for distributed trace collection to our internal tree and it should hopefully go into the next nightly sync.

body:
@kbrems  No problem.  Please bear in mind that much of this functionality is still being developed/refactored and will probably need to change a little before we are happy with it.

@mrry has just submitted some support for distributed trace collection  to our internal tree and it should hopefully go into the next nightly sync.
